definitions.definition: (of people) To cause (someone) to be acquainted (with someone else).
definitions.example: Let me introduce you to my friends.

definitions.definition: To make (something or someone) known by formal announcement or recommendation.
definitions.example: Let me introduce our guest speaker.

definitions.definition: To add (something) to a system, a mixture, or a container.
definitions.example: Various pollutants were introduced into the atmosphere.
Wheeled transport was introduced long ago.
